mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BRAND_LINEUP BL LEFT JOIN BRAND_LINEUP_IMAGE BLI ON BL.BRAND_LINEUP_IDX = BLI.BRAND_LINEUP_IDX JOIN BRAND_MANUFACTURER BM ON BL.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX = BM.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX JOIN BRAND_PURPOSE BP ON BL.BRAND_PURPOSE_IDX = BP.BRAND_PURPOSE_IDX JOIN BRAND_LINEUP_RANKS BLR ON BL.BRAND_LINEUP_RANK_IDX = BLR.BRAND_LINEUP_RANK_IDX WHERE BL.BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX = #{BRAND_MANUFACTURER_IDX}
